LanguageData.OGDE_AirStrike_SplinterCannon.label: splinter cannon run
LanguageData.OGDE_AirStrike_SplinterCannon.descriptio: Strike ship fills the air with shards from its twin splinter cannons. Covers a large area. Particularly effective against unarmored units.
LanguageData.OGDE_AirStrike_DisintegratorCannon.label: disintegrator cannon assault
LanguageData.OGDE_AirStrike_DisintegratorCannon.descr: The powerful frontal autocannon can deal high damages to armored units and buildings. It does not cover a wide area though.
LanguageData.OGDE_AirStrike_Darklance.label: splinter cannon and darklance strafe run
LanguageData.OGDE_AirStrike_Darklance.description: Strike ship attacks with both gatling guns and darklances. A truly devastative assault.
